abstract: Thomas Ryan, a former chief executive of CVS Caremark, has joined the private equity firm Advent International as an operating partner.
snippet: Thomas Ryan, a former chief executive of CVS Caremark, has joined the private equity firm Advent International as an operating partner.
lead_paragraph: Thomas Ryan, a former chief executive of CVS Caremark, has joined the private equity firm Advent International as an operating partner.

headline.main: Former Chief of CVS Caremark Joins Private Equity Firm
